body.name: Linksys Mesh Wifi 6 Router, Dual-Band, 1,700 Sq. ft Coverage, 25+ Devices, Speeds up to (AX1800) 1.8Gbps - MR7350
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 55 mins
features: STREAM NONSTOP: Linksys Max-Stream MR7350 WiFi router uses Intelligent Mesh to deliver the speed of WiFi 6. With access to higher bandwidth limits you can stream content, game with friends, and video chat with family like never before

THE POWER AND RELIABILITY OF WIFI 6: Experience rock solid connectivity with this dual-band WiFi 6 wireless router. An advanced Qualcomm chipset delivers the ultimate mesh WiFi 6 experience for stable streaming, and wire-like low latency

MORE WIFI FOR MORE DEVICES: Supporting 25+ devices, and up to 1,700 sq ft, this WiFi 6 router sends and receives multiple streams of data simultaneously, providing up to 4x the WiFi capacity so it can handle more gaming and smart home devices

EASY SETUP & CONTROL: Wireless routers set up in minutes with the free Linksys App, allowing seamless management of your WiFi mesh network system. You can view or prioritize which connected devices are using the most WiFi from anywhere.

POWERED BY INTELLIGENT MESH TECHNOLOGY: Eliminate dead zones and dynamically maximize speed with Linksys WiFi mesh networks. Expand the range of your WiFi network by adding nodes to keep your connection going strong
body.description: Experience Mesh Wi-Fi that lets you stream, game and binge nonstop with the Linksys MR7350 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router. The MR7350 covers up to 1500 square feet and handles up to 20+ devices at speeds up to 1.5 Gbps. Powered by Intelligent Mesh Technology that was built from the ground up, your devices will always be on the fastest path to the internet. If your needs change and you want to grow your network, this future-ready router expands by adding any Linksys Mesh compatible products. Setup is easy using the Linksys App and you’ll be streaming and ready to binge in minutes.With Alexa, you can easily manage Wi-Fi access for devices and individuals in the home, taking focus away from screens and back to what’s important. Say commands like “Alexa, turn off Timmy’s Wi-Fi”, when it’s time for dinner or “Alexa, enable guest Wi-Fi” when you have people over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very user friendly, reliable, and easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: I've never had any sort of problem with this router so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Wi-Fi 6 for one bedroom apartment
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Linksys MR7350 Ax1800 for a few weeks now. It’s excellent budget Wi-Fi 6 With new features like 1024 QAM, that send more data with each transmission, and OFDMA, that manage simultaneous connections efficiently.The top speeds is 1.2 gigabits per second on the 5GHz band and 574 Mbps on the 2.4GHz band. I don’t have internet that fast to test the top speeds but in a MacBook you can see the (Tx) transmission rate meaning your speed to the router, and it’s 960 Mbps on 5GHz all around my one bedroom apartment.The band-steering option that lets the router automatically switch between the 5GHz and 2.4GHz bands for the optimal result can’t be switched off. Anecdotally this feature works fine most of the time but in two occasions it didn’t and it stayed on the less optimum bandwidth for a while before adjusting back. (I didn’t realize it because of drop in performance but because I was monitoring and testing the new setup)The range is excellent for one bedroom apartment, but I don’t think it’s suitable for large multi level homes because it barely works at the end the hallway of my apartment building which is all wood construction. The iPhone app is intuitive and works reliably.Overall it’s a great option (I bought mine on sale) and I would recommend it for one bedroom apartment with many devices. It works great in my situation with around 10 devices including Apple TV, MacBooks, NAS, handheld and HomeKit devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that it is performing as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Although I had my 'tech guy' install the router - it was fast, and seems to be working very nicely. Visually (if you have it visible) it has a very nice appearance, and the blue light is easy on the eyes. Not much more to report on this. Since I got this installed -- not much time has passed in order to give a full-throated review - but, So-Far-So-Good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This router was easy to set up and reaches all areas of our 2 story house. Much better than the router that we rented from Spectrum . We also get a strong signal in our attached garage. I recommend this router.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lack of control over your network
reviews.reviewText: This requires you to login only through the app - no logging in directly into your router. Want to change your dhcp settings or add a static IP address you have to login to the router through your Linksys web account, then it is supposed to scan for your router and THEN you’re supposed to be able to change settings. It shows up in my phone but never shows up on my account- says it doesn’t detect it.I can’t set up my camera system, I can’t add a LAN to LAN connection because this whole system/process takes away control from the user as far as I can see. Also, logging into one’s router through the internet through another website (Linksys account) seems risky and insecure enough. Why add this extra hurdle.No thanks. If you’re grandpa I guess this router would work for them just fine.Router looks nice but wasted my time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solved my wi-fi coverage problem
reviews.reviewText: Had been having problem with Verizon Fios wi-fi in my upstairs room and sometimes on same floor as the router (other side of house) Reception would come and go. reliability was often poor. Had an older linksys that had used but similar reception issues. Tried all the channels, moved antenna, no luck. Decided to get a wi-fi 6 device and see how that worked. Found this router at a very good price. Setup was quick and easy. You do need to use the app on your phone for the setup but I don't consider that to be an inconvenience. The features on the app provide a lot of info in addition to the setup. My wi-fi connectivity issues were solved soon as this unit was setup. Have reliable coverage all over the house with most locations getting speeds same as if laptop were plugged into a wired connection. Was well worth the purchase.
Tiene muy buena cobertura en interiores, y da muy buena velocidad de conexión.
Util para conectar via ethernet y buena señal y estabilidad.

Es fácil de instalar, y por el tamaño pensé que no tendría mejor cobertura que el EA6900, pero tiene mucho mejor alcanze y el internet es estable y puedo tener conectado todos mis dispositivos, lo recomiendo.
Esta genial el router.. se los recomiendo..
